NASA daily pic

Or how to test with Jest?

The pic displayed behind is


This is a simple app created for educational purpose.
The main thought was to practice unit and integration testing
with emphasis on api's
In this purpose I'v used "Jest" framework and NASA's api
To check for results get the project on your computer and run npm test!
